label: 外記
本: Capital and Countryside in Japan, 300-1180:  Japanese Historians Interpreted in English . Cornell University East Asia Program . 2006
説明文: a secretary of the Council of State and member of the Council Secretariat (Gekikyoku 外記局). Originally considered as fourth-rankers (sakan) for the Shônagonkyoku 少納言局, they drafted all sorts of administrative documents. [主典]
